name: segfault-raub
description: Catches SIGSEGV and prints diagnostic information

scripts.build: cd src && node-gyp rebuild -j max --silent && node -e "require('addon-tools-raub').cpbin('segfault')" && cd ..
scripts.build-only: cd src && node-gyp build -j max --silent && node -e "require('addon-tools-raub').cpbin('segfault')" && cd ..
